Description:
Detects execution of regsvr32 where the DLL is located in a highly suspicious locations

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Regsvr32 Execution From Highly Suspicious Location
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe' and original_file_name = 'regsvr32.exe') and ((command like '%:\perflogs\%' or command like '%:\temp\%' or command like '%\windows\registration\crmlog%' or command like '%\windows\system32\com\dmp\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\fxstmp\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\microsoft\crypto\rsa\machinekeys\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\spool\printers\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\spool\servers\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\tasks_migrated\%' or command like '%\windows\system32\tasks\microsoft\windows\synccenter\%' or command like '%\windows\syswow64\com\dmp\%' or command like '%\windows\syswow64\fxstmp\%' or command like '%\windows\syswow64\tasks\microsoft\windows\pla\system\%' or command like '%\windows\syswow64\tasks\microsoft\windows\synccenter\%' or command like '%\windows\tasks\%' or command like '%\windows\tracing\%') or ((command like '% "c:\%' or command like '% c:\%' or command like '% 'c:\%' or command like '%d:\%') and  not (command like '%c:\program files (x86)\%' or command like '%c:\program files\%' or command like '%c:\programdata\%' or command like '%c:\users\%' or command like '% c:\windows\%' or command like '% "c:\windows\%' or command like '% 'c:\windows\%'))) and  not (command = 'null' or command = ''))
